title: Playlist+
description: A Next.js and React web app that integrates with Spotify to generate niche music playlists, analyze listening habits, and help users discover new artists.

title: Simple Food Ordering System
description: Java CLI app for ordering food from a single restaurant, focusing on OOP concepts, file-based storage, and UML diagrams.

title: My Resume Site
description: Created with Blazor and C# using the Bootstrap library and deployed to GitHub pages. Includes my experience and abilities.
